name: The Taidon History
storyline: This is the story of Taidon, a young adventurer who dies trying to save his family from the infamous monsters who kidnapped them. But before dying a spectrum decides to help him complete his mission while dead. Taidon becomes a deadly spectrum, allowing him to fight even after death. Will you be able to complete your mission? Will the price of this new opportunity that destiny offered him be too much for him?
summary: Dive into this exciting Action RPG game with elements of a Shooter. In which you must be fast and agile to beat your opponents. A small challenge for adrenaline fans, set in an unusual magical world. The philosophy of this game is that there are no enemies too small, all opponents represent a real threat no matter how strong you are.
